title: Isaac Harper
subtitle: My homebase on the internet. A growing collection of projects I'm working on and anything I think is valuable enough to write down.
intro: Hey, welcome to my site. This is a collection of everything related to me and will be continually growing with me and changing as I try out new ideas.
Take a look around and take a look at some of the cool projects that I've been up to.
Feel free to contact me for any reason as IsaacHarperDev@gmail.com
